name: plausible
tagline: A privacy focused self-hosted web analytics platform
description: Plausible Analytics is a privacy-focused, self-hosted web analytics platform. It offers lightweight tracking, beautiful reports, and is a privacy-friendly alternative to Google Analytics.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track website visitors without cookies or personal data collection for GDPR compliance

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Under 1KB tracking script loads fast and doesn't impact page performance

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Set up custom events and conversion goals to measure user actions and funnel performance

features.title: Device And Browser Stats
features.description: Understand your audience with breakdowns by device type, browser, and operating system
